mapper.select: /*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionCnt] */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsp_production WHERE visible = 'Y'

/*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionList] */ SELECT tp.idx, title, description, visible, (SELECT name FROM app_user_info WHERE user_seq = creator) AS adminName, creator, create_time AS createTime, updater, update_time AS updateTime, file_mask, file_path file_name FROM tsp_production tp, tsp_image ti WHERE tp.idx = ti.type_idx AND ti.type_name = 'production' AND visible = 'Y' ORDER BY tp.idx ASC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{size}

/*[AdminProductionApi_SQL.xml].[getProductionInfo] */ SELECT idx, title, description, visible, (SELECT name FROM app_user_info WHERE user_seq = creator) AS adminName, creator, create_time AS createTime, updater, update_time AS updateTime FROM tsp_production WHERE visible = 'Y' AND idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tsp_production(title, description, visible, creator, create_time, updater, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{visible}, '1', now(), '1', now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tsp_production SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, visible = #{visible}, updater = #{updater}, update_time = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
